pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, October 13, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Yerevan, Armenia

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a wreath laying ceremony.

Tsitsernakaberd Memorial Complex

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Museum of the Armenian Genocide.

Tsitsernakaberd Memorial Complex

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

9:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a tree planting ceremony.

Tsitsernakaberd Memorial Complex

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a farewell ceremony, and will meet with Prime Minister of the Republic of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Prime Minister of the Republic of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Grounds of the Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon with members of the Canadian-Armenia community.

Closed to media. 

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa, Ontario.

Zvartnots International Airport

Closed to media.
